message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but I believe I can't afford $14,000 at the moment. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am still not able to meet the $12,000 price point. I am willing to go up to $11,000. Is there any way we could come to an agreement?
